name: 林懷恩
objective:
先修課程：負責教授同意。
本課程旨在教授學生機械製造技術的基礎概念，內容可分為五個核心學習目標，包括：
1.　　材料之基本原理：行為及製造性質
2.　　固化製程與設備：金屬鑄造之基本原理、製程與設備、設計、材料和經濟效益
3.　　成型及造形之製程與設備：粉末製程、金屬成型加工、塑膠與複合材料成型
4.　　切削等材料移除製程：金屬切削、放電加工、化學腐蝕
5.　　結合製程:銲接、粘合，機械式固定

This course aims to teach students the basic concepts of manufacturing engineering and technology. The content can be divided into five core learning targets, including:
1. Basic principles of materials: behavior and manufacturing properties
2. Solidification process and equipment: basic principles, process, equipment, design, materials and economic benefits of metal casting
3. Process and equipment for forming and shaping: powder metallurgy, metal forming, plastic and composite material forming
4. Material removal process: metal cutting, spark machining, chemical corrosion
5. Combination process: welding, bonding, mechanical fixing
schedule:
第1週 機械製造概論
Introduction to Manufacturing Engineering

第2週 材料的結構、機械行為、測試與製造性質 
Material structure, mechanical behavior, testing and manufacturing properties

第3週 金屬鑄造(一)：基本原理、製程及設備 
Metal casting (1): basic principles, manufacturing process and equipment

第4週 金屬鑄造(二)：製程及設備、設計、材料與經濟效益
Metal casting (2): process and equipment, design, materials and economic benefits

第5週 金屬輥軋、鍛造、擠製的製程與設備(一)　　
Metal rolling, forging, extrusion process and equipment (1)

第6週 金屬輥軋、鍛造、擠製的製程與設備(二)
Metal rolling, forging, extrusion process and equipment (2)

第7週 板金成型的製程與設備
Metal forming process and equipment

第8週 粉末金屬的製程及設備
Metal powder metallurgy and equipment

第9週 期中考 Middle examination

第10週 塑膠及複合材料：成型與造形
Plastics and composite materials: molding and shaping

第11週 切削的基本原理
Basic principles of cutting

第12週 切削刀具材料及切削液、車銑拉鋸銼等切削製程(一)
Cutting tool materials and cutting fluids, turning, milling, broaching, sawing, filing and other cutting processes (1)

第13週 切削刀具材料及切削液、車銑拉鋸銼等切削製程(二)
Cutting tool materials and cutting fluids, turning, milling, broaching, sawing, filing and other cutting processes (2)

第14週 先進切削製程與設備
Advanced cutting process and equipment

第15週 熔合熔接及固態熔接的製程
Fusion and solid-state welding process

第16週 國紀念日遇例假補假
Compensatory time

第17週 硬焊、軟焊、黏接與機械固定的製程
Process of brazing, soldering, bonding and mechanical fixing

第18週 期末考Final exam
